text: Tashinkyō no on'na to wa, ka no on'na ga shinja ni naru made wa kekkon shite wa naranai. Tatoe anata gata ga kiniitte ite mo, tashinkyō no on'na yori wa shinkō no aru on'nadorei ga masaru. Mata tashinkyō no otoko ga shinja ni naru made wa, anata gata no joshi o kare-ra ni totsuga sete wa naranai. Tatoe anata gata no kiniitte ite mo, tashinkyō no otoko yori wa shinkō aru dorei no kata ga katte iru. Korera no mono wa, shinja o gōka ni izanau. Daga arrā wa kan'yō ni tsumi o yurusa re, rakuen ni yobiire rareru. Mata hitobito ni, kare no shirushi o meiji sa reru. Osoraku kare-ra wa hansei surudearou
